title: LaEqEd v1.1 Error
content:
Hello everyone,

I have downloaded laeqed v1.1 and miktex also have updated miktex.

I still can't run (compile) the laeqed and have the following error message:

java.io.IOException: Cannot run program "latex" (in directory "C:\DOCUME~1\ADMINI~1\LOCALS~1\Temp"): CreateProcess error=2, The system cannot find the file specified  
 at java.lang.ProcessBuilder.start(Unknown Source)  
 at dk.thrysoee.laeqed.NativeC.runProcessBuilder(NativeC.java:149)  
 at dk.thrysoee.laeqed.NativeC.runLatex(NativeC.java:126)  
 at dk.thrysoee.laeqed.NativeC.exec(NativeC.java:72)  
 at dk.thrysoee.laeqed.LaeqedC$7.doInBackground(LaeqedC.java:384)  
 at dk.thrysoee.laeqed.LaeqedC$7.doInBackground(LaeqedC.java:376)  
 at dk.thrysoee.utils.swingworker.SwingWorker$1.call(SwingWorker.java:280)  
 at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source)  
 at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source)  
 at dk.thrysoee.utils.swingworker.SwingWorker.run(SwingWorker.java:323)  
 at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source)  
 at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source)  
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)  
Caused by: java.io.IOException: CreateProcess error=2, The system cannot find the file specified  
 at java.lang.ProcessImpl.create(Native Method)  
 at java.lang.ProcessImpl.(Unknown Source)  
 at java.lang.ProcessImpl.start(Unknown Source)  
 ... 13 more

Can someone please tell me step-by-step to solve this error and start to use the laeqed v1.1 for math typing?

Regards

Alexiy
author: yury90
